Name: Escape Mind
About the game: Escape Mind is a Point & Click mini game and Escape Room. With average play time of 30min. Made by a solo and independent developer It has rooms filled with difficult puzzles to solve. Pixelart graphics to create a nostalgic atmosphere. You just woke up in an abandoned house and the last thing you remember was chasing a little rabbit. Find a way to escape by solving the puzzles ahead, use the collected items to help solving the secrets. Time to relax, use logical reasoning and arouse the detective within you. Can you escape? Have fun. Does not work with Mac or Linux Be advised that the game breaks on higher refresh rates. Slowing down to 144 Hz may solve the problem. High refresh rate monitors are not recommended.
